commands.name: ping
commands.description: Pong

commands.name: prefix
commands.description: Set the bot prefix for the current server. Use without an argument to get the current prefix

commands.name: invite
commands.description: Get the invite link for sushii to add to another server

commands.name: about
commands.description: Get information about sushii

commands.name: rank
commands.description: Show your XP and rank in the server

commands.name: rep
commands.description: Give a rep to someone, 12 hour cooldown

commands.name: fishy
commands.description: Give a fishies to someone or yourself, 12 hour cooldown. Fishies for others result in larger catches.

commands.name: userinfo
commands.description: Look up information relating to a user and member if available. This also works for users not in the same server. Defaults to your own info.

commands.name: avatar
commands.description: Get the avatar of a given user. Defaults to your own avatar.

groups.name: notifications
groups.description: Get notifications when someone send messages containing a keyword

commands.name: notification add
commands.description: Adds a notification. sushii will send you a DM whenever someone sends a message with the keyword

commands.name: notification list
commands.description: Shows all your active notifications

commands.name: notification delete
commands.description: Deletes a notification

groups.name: reminders
groups.description: Let sushii notify you in the future for given reminders

commands.name: remind
commands.description: Add a reminder. You can provide the duration in any part of the reminder description.

examples.content: Ok! I'll remind you here in 12h (`2021-01-13 12:01:07` UTC)

commands.name: remind list
commands.description: Shows all your pending reminders

groups.name: last.fm
groups.description: Look up what you are listening to on a connected Last.fm account. You must have a [Last.fm](https://www.last.fm/) account to use these commands.

commands.name: fm set
commands.description: Set your Last.fm username.

commands.name: fm np
commands.description: Show your now playing or last played track. Mention or pass an ID to see what another user's latest track

commands.name: fm recent
commands.description: Show your recently played tracks

commands.name: fm topartists
commands.description: Show your most played artists. Defaults to overal

commands.name: fm loved
commands.description: Show your loved tracks

commands.name: fm profile
commands.description: Show your Last.fm profile

groups.name: tags
groups.description: "Custom" commands, create tags with custom responses

commands.name: tag
commands.description: Get a tag

examples.content: Risky, risky, wiggy, wigi. This is an emergency

commands.name: tag random
commands.description: Get a random tag

commands.name: tag info
commands.description: Get information about a tag

commands.name: tag add
commands.description: Add a new tag

examples.command: tag add risky Risky, risky, wiggy, wigi. This is an emergency

examples.content: Created a new tag `risky` with content: Risky, risky, wiggy, wigi. This is an emergency

commands.name: tag list
commands.description: Show all available tags in the server

commands.name: tag search
commands.description: Search for tags containing a query

commands.name: tag remove
commands.description: Delete a tag. Only the tag owner and users with `MANAGE_GUILD` may delete the tag.

commands.name: tag edit
commands.description: Edit a tag's content.  Only the tag owner and users with `MANAGE_GUILD` may edit the tag.

commands.name: tag rename
commands.description: Rename a tag.  Only the tag owner and users with `MANAGE_GUILD` may rename the tag.

groups.name: feeds
groups.description: Get notified when something new is released, currently only supports `vlive.tv`. New feeds to be added soon!

commands.name: feed add
commands.description: Add a new feed. This will start the set up process and ask you more questions to set up a new feed

commands.name: feed list
commands.description: Get the list of active feeds

commands.name: feed delete
commands.description: Delete a feed. Use `feed list` to get the list of feeds with the corresponding ID.

commands.name: prune
commands.description: Delete bulk messages between 1 and 99 messages.

commands.name: ban
commands.description: Ban one or more users. IDs or mentions can be separated with a  space or comma. Users do not need to be in the guild.
commands.usage: [one or more user IDs or mentions] (reason)

commands.name: unban
commands.description: Unban one or more users. IDs or mentions can be separated with a  space or comma.
commands.usage: [one or more user IDs or mentions] (reason)

commands.name: kick
commands.description: Kick one or more users. IDs or mentions can be separated with a  space or comma.
commands.usage: [one or more user IDs or mentions] (reason)

commands.name: mute
commands.description: Mute one or more users. IDs or mentions can be separated with a  space or comma. Sends user a DM with reason and duration if `mutedm` setting is enabled.
commands.usage: [one or more user IDs or mentions] (duration) (reason)

commands.name: mute setduration
commands.description: Change the duration of an existing mute. Use indefinite (or indef, inf, none) to remove duration.
commands.usage: [user ID or mention] (new duration or indefinite)

commands.name: mute addduration
commands.description: Add to the duration of an existing mute.

commands.name: unmute
commands.description: Unmute one or more users. IDs or mentions can be separated with a  space or comma. Sends user a DM `mutedm` setting is enabled.
commands.usage: [one or more user IDs or mentions] (reason)

commands.name: listmutes
commands.description: List currently ongoing mutes in the guild, with the user, mute duration, and duration left.

commands.name: warn
commands.description: Warn one or more users. Sends user a DM with reason if `warndm` setting is enabled.  IDs or mentions can be separated with a space or comma.
commands.usage: [one or more user IDs or mentions] (reason)

commands.name: history
commands.description: Show the case history for a given user. The actions warn,  mute, kick, ban will be shown.

commands.name: reason
commands.description: Set the reason for a moderation case. This will also set the moderator who performed this action. If a range is provided (eg. 12-15), it will update all cases (inclusive) 12, 13, 14, 15 with the given reason for easier bulk actions. Using latest will update the most recent case, and latest~n will update the most recent n cases.
commands.usage: [latest or latest~n or case ID or case ID range] [reason]

examples.content: Finished updating latest 1 case with reason: `spamming`
Finished updating latest 3 cases with reason: `spamming`

commands.name: deletecase
commands.description: Delete a moderation case.

commands.name: slowmode
commands.description: Sets slowmode for a given channel

commands.name: settings list
commands.description: Lists server settings

commands.name: settings joinmsg set
commands.description: Set the message sent on new member join to the configured msgchannel.  You can use the following replacements: <username>, <mention>, <server>

commands.name: settings joinmsg on/off/toggle
commands.description: Enable or disable message on new member join

commands.name: settings joinreact set
commands.description: Set the reaction to new member join message

commands.name: settings joinreact on/off/toggle
commands.description: Enable or disable reaction to new member join message

commands.name: settings leavemsg set
commands.description: Set the message on member leave to the configured msgchannel

commands.name: settings leavemsg on/off/toggle
commands.description: Enable or disable message sent on member leave

commands.name: settings msgchannel set
commands.description: Set the channel to send join / leave messages

commands.name: settings msglog set/on/off/toggle
commands.description: Channel to send message delete/edit logs

commands.name: settings modlog set
commands.description: Set the channel to send moderation logs

commands.name: settings modlog on/off/toggle
commands.description: Enable or disable moderation logs

commands.name: settings memberlog set/on/off/toggle
commands.description: Set the channel to send member join/leave logs

commands.name: settings memberlog on/off/toggle
commands.description: Enable or disable member join/leave logs

commands.name: settings mute role
commands.description: Set the mute role

commands.name: settings mute defaultduration
commands.description: Set the default duration for mutes when muting by manually adding a role to a member, or if a duration is not provided when using the mute command. The default duration is 1 day (24 hours). You can disable the default duration by using 0 or "indefinite" as the duration. This would make mutes not automatically expire.

examples.content: Set the default mute duration to `30m`
Default mute duration set to indefinite (will not expire)

commands.name: settings mutedm set
commands.description: Set the message sent to DM members when they are muted

commands.name: settings mutedm set/on/off/toggle
commands.description: Enable or disable sending messages to DM members on mute

commands.name: settings disablechannel
commands.description: Disable command and tag usage in given channels

commands.name: settings enablechannel
commands.description: Re-enable command and tag usage in given channels

commands.name: settings disabledchannels
commands.description: List the currently disabled channels

commands.name: roles set
commands.description: Set the roles configuration. Supports both JSON and TOML formats.

commands.name: roles get
commands.description: Get the current role configuration

commands.name: roles setchannel
commands.description: Set the channel for role assignments

commands.name: roles sendinfo
commands.description: Send roles help message to role channel for members as a  reference for all available role groups, role names, and limits

commands.name: roles listids
commands.description: List all the current guild roles and IDs
